course.title: On Love: Gender, Sexuality, Identity
course.description: Is romantic love a life-altering "event" in Alain Badiou's sense? Or is it a biopolitical tool of neoliberal control in Michel Foucault's sense? This course examines love from a philosophical, psychoanalytic, critical theoretical, and cultural studies perspective. Special attention is given to the foundational role of love in how Western subjects negotiate the complexities of gender, sexuality, and identity.
